Player History
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 1966...
Drafted in 5th round, 81st overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1971...
Injured on 4/29/1972 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 8/14/1972 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 6 days...
Hit first career homerun on 8/11/1975, off Clay Carroll (ATL)...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/14/1980 to a 3-year deal worth $3,820,000 per year...
Injured on 5/19/1981 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
